mapper.select: SELECT a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_PRICE, a.ITEM_DCPRICE, a.ITEM_REMAINCOUNT, b.* FROM PET_ITEM a, PET_ITEM_BASKET b WHERE b.basket_no = #{BASKET_NO} AND a.ITEM_NO = b.ITEM_NO

SELECT a.ITEM_NAME, a.ITEM_IMG, a.ITEM_PRICE, b.MEMBER_NAME, b.MEMBER_TEL, b.MEMBER_EMAIL, b.MEMBER_ADDRESS, b.MEMBER_ADDRESS2, b.MEMBER_ZIPCODE, b.MEMBER_NEWADDRESS, b.MEMBER_NEWADDRESS2, b.MEMBER_NEWZIPCODE FROM PET_ITEM a, PET_MEMBER b WHERE a.ITEM_NO = #{ITEM_NO} AND b.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into PET_ITEM_BASKET (BASKET_NO, ITEM_NO, MEMBER_ID, BASKET_BUYCOUNT) values(BASKET_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ITEM_NO}, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{BASKET_BUYCOUNT})
